markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Know Oneself](/Feats.aspx?ID=944) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 12 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Access**
Vudrani ethnicity

**Trigger**
You roll a critical failure on a saving throw against an [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60) effect.

</column>

---

You center yourself and call to mind the Vudrani monastic ideals of mindfulness and self-knowledge. You fail the save against the emotion effect instead of critically failing.
name: Know Oneself
